channel.title: Runite ore miner neeeded!will pay! :d
channel.description:
Hey im new to using SCAR for RS so what im looking for is a) someone to run me through how i go about using it i can be contact on msn if need be b) a script that i can use in various runite places including wilderness(if possible) that mines logs me out and picks a random world and tries there. This would be greatly helpful to me!
Please get in touch thanks :D

item.title: Runite ore miner neeeded!will pay! :d
item.dc:creator: @kitty-man kitty-man
item.description:
@kitty-man wrote:

Well, it would be nice to al least have a script that does that…
so I’m no good at scripting, so you’d want it to… of course, click on the runite
rocks, but u gotta have support on if ur attacked. as for the logging out part…
it would have to click the logout button and click on the world change at the bottom-
left and… I guess randomly click in the void of worlds, then type you’re info and log you in.
Don’t forget to have it bring a telly so when its full you can telleport to fally or sumwhere.

Read full topic

@hey321 wrote:

Mine it yourself? I’ll mine it for you if I get half the ore lmao ^^. I think it would be REALLY hard to make one so that’s why I’m suggesting mining it yourself.
